mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT dbo.FN_COMMON_NM('CARD', A.COMPANY)) AS COMPANY, (SELECT CARD_NUM FROM CARD_INFO WHERE RIGHT(CARD_NUM, 4) = RIGHT(A.CARD_NUM, 4) AND COMPANY = A.COMPANY) AS CARD_NUM, A.USE_DATE, A.APPROVAL_NUM, A.ACCOUNT, CASE WHEN A.REFUND != 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.APPROVAL END AS APPROVAL, A.REFUND FROM CORPORATE_TEMP A WHERE A.FILE_NM = #{FILE_NM} ORDER BY A.USE_DATE;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CORPORATE_TEMP (COMPANY, CARD_NUM, USE_DATE, APPROVAL_NUM, ACCOUNT, APPROVAL, REFUND, FILE_NM, REG_ID, REG_DT) VALUES
( (SELECT SYS_ITEM_CD FROM SYSCODE_DETAIL WHERE SYS_ITEM_NAME = #{item.COMPANY}), #{item.CARD_NUM}, #{item.USE_DATE}, #{item.APPROVAL_NUM}, #{item.ACCOUNT}, (CASE WHEN #{item.APPROVAL} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{item.APPROVAL} END), (CASE WHEN #{item.REFUND} = '' THEN '0' ELSE #{item.REFUND} END), #{item.FILE_NM}, #{item.REG_ID}, GETDATE() )

INSERT INTO CORPORATECARD_INFO (COMPANY, CARD_NUM, USE_DATE, APPROVAL_NUM, ACCOUNT, APPROVAL, REFUND, FILE_NM, REG_ID, REG_DT) SELECT COMPANY, CARD_NUM, USE_DATE, APPROVAL_NUM, ACCOUNT, APPROVAL, REFUND, FILE_NM, REG_ID, REG_DT FROM CORPORATE_TEMP WHERE REG_ID LIKE #{USER_ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CORPORATE_TEMP WHERE REG_ID LIKE #{USER_ID}
